name: Risq Group
description:
Founded in 2010, RISQ has grown organically by identifying and capturing opportunities in alternative and emerging markets.
 We began by trading structured finance products with professional sports teams and commercial sponsors, expanded into the gaming industry to provide insurance against large payouts and now we're trading digital assets and new energy markets.
 We build flexible technology and structures. When we identify new opportunities, we leverage existing infrastructure and supplement it with domain knowledge to keep growing.
Headline: A diversified trading firm, driven by technology
ShortDescription: A technology-driven principal trading firm with a focus on alternative and emerging asset classes

Highlights.name: Talent
Highlights.description: Attracting and empowering exceptional individuals to foster growth.

Highlights.name: Technology
Highlights.description: Innovating bespoke trading systems for efficiency and automation.

Highlights.name: Execution
Highlights.description: Ensuring flawless performance from quotes to high-frequency trading.

key_use_cases: Improving employee engagement through total rewards
